thread.title: Tunisia: Speeding Up Pace of Developing Strategy for Creation of Regions Bank - Finmin
thread.title_full: Tunisia: Speeding Up Pace of Developing Strategy for Creation of Regions Bank - Finmin

title: Tunisia: Speeding Up Pace of Developing Strategy for Creation of Regions Bank - Finmin
text:
Libya: UN Envoy Urges Parties to Agree Unity Government 
Tunis, — Finance Minister Slim Chaker recommended accelerating the pace of developing the strategy for the creation of the bank of regions. 
At a workshop held Thursday in Tunis on this issue, in the presence of representatives of the German Development Bank (KFW) and of the Ministry of Finance, Chaker emphasised the need to ensure co-ordination with the different concerned sides and draw on the technical assistance provided by KFW in this area. 
KFW representatives expressed the willingness of their institution to strengthen co-operation with Tunisia regarding the bank of regions. 
KFW also plans to continue its technical assistance and work as a leading partner in the creation of projects in Tunisian interior regions. Tunisia
